track.name: We're Going to Be Friends
comments: I love this- it's so calming

Pure Jack White genius & love. Am always moved by this song because he manages to capture in such a minimalist way that totally elusive bittersweet feeling of childhood nostalgia & the sweetness of friendships.
im so glad he dumped his sister..... lol.... i love Jacks solo stuff...
I want this played at my everything
Am I the only one who thinks of PBS when they hear this?  I can't be the only guy who grew up watching it.
makes me want to be a kid again and  play  tag ,go climb a tree, and splash in the mud lol so cute also makes me think of first love
I wish my childhood was like this. [4] Simple yet beautiful song.
I like how Jack seems to screw up the final chord and then tries to sustain his laughter until he's held the chord long enough for the sound to fade out.
I wish my childhood was like this. [3]
